DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate clinical result including plaque index, gingival inflammation, bleeding score, pocket depth reduction and clinical attachment level gain after used locally-delivered gel containing Camella sinensis extracts as an adjunctive treatment in periodontal therapy
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Effects of Locally-delivered Gel Containing Camella Sinensis Extracts as an Adjunct in Peridontitis Treatment
DOC.criteria: subjects have sound tooth with pocket depth = or > 5 mm. without caries, restoration, mobility and furcation involvement no systemic complicated factors no allergy to green tea or product of green tea signing in informed consent form smoking pregnancy or lactation antibiotic premedication or antibiotic intake in previous 3 month
